docTitle.titlePart:
TI Values in Hydride and New Molecular Hydrogen Phosphite Complexes of
Comparable Structure

byline.docAuthor: Stefan0 Antoniutti, Gabriele Albertin," Paola Amendola, and Emilio Bordignon*

byline.affiliation: Dipartimento di Chimica deII'Universita di Venezia,

front.address: Calle Larga S. Marta 2137, 30123 Venice, Italy
front.div:
The molecular hydrogen complexes {MH(q2-H2)[PhP(OEt)2]4}BPh4 (M = Fe, Ru, 0 s ) and dihydride species
{ C O H~[ P~P ( O E~)~]~} B P~~
have been prepared and T1 measurements for H-and q2-H2 resonances give Tl <I00 ms
for all complexes at 80 MHz.
